channel.title: Hao on HPCAT
channel.description: Recent content in Hao on HPCAT

item.title: Graduate student, Hao Zheng, has had a paper published
item.description: A graduate student, Hao Zheng, has had a paper published in IEEE Computer Architecture Letters titled “EZ-Pass: An Energy & Performance-Efficient Power-gating Router Architecture for Scalable NoCs”.
